'''

# Import necessary libraries
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from collections import Counter
from nltk.corpus import stopwords

# Tokenize the texts and remove stopwords
nltk.download('punkt')
nltk.download('stopwords')
stop_words = set(stopwords.words('english'))
tokenized_group1 = []
for text in Group1:
    tokenized_group1.extend(word_tokenize(text))
tokenized_group1 = [word for word in tokenized_group1 if word not in stop_words]

tokenized_group2 = []
for text in Group2:
    tokenized_group2.extend(word_tokenize(text))
tokenized_group2 = [word for word in tokenized_group2 if word not in stop_words]

# Count the frequency of each word
word_counts_group1 = Counter(tokenized_group1)
word_counts_group2 = Counter(tokenized_group2)

# Find the words that are systematically different
different_words = set(word_counts_group1.keys()) ^ set(word_counts_group2.keys())

# Print the words that are systematically different
print(different_words)  # This will print the words that are systematically different between the two groups
